thread.title: Sisters Separated in Korea Are Reunited 40 Years Later After Being Hired By Same Florida Hospital

title: Sisters Separated in Korea Are Reunited 40 Years Later After Being Hired By Same Florida Hospital
text:
Published By: Time - Today 
The women, who are now in their 40s, were working on the same floor at the hospital...
